text: @realDonaldTrump All Americans are concerned to some degree. Your history of 16,000+ lies doesn’t engender credence or confidence in your problem solving abilities. Leave that to the experts. Only when Coronavirus threatened the economy, which you tout as your accomplishment, have you cooperated.
